description.fr:
{%FightTurnStarted} {ATvalue:p,percent,+} par {%Family_Bwork_Name} {PropertyEffect:45[ENRAGÉ]} pour le tour.
\---
Lorsqu'il atteint 50% de sa {%pvmax,plural:other}\_: {PropertyEffect:45[ENRAGE]} les {%Family_Bwork_Name,plural:other} de manière permanente.
description.en:
{%FightTurnStarted} {ATvalue:p,percent,+} per {PropertyEffect:45[ENRAGED]} {%Family_Bwork_Name} for the turn.
\---
When he reaches 50% of his {%pvmax,plural:other}: {PropertyEffect:45[ENRAGES]} the {%Family_Bwork_Name,plural:other} permanently.
description.es:
{%FightTurnStarted} {ATvalue:p,percent,+} por {%Family_Bwork_Name} {PropertyEffect:45[RABIOSO]} durante el turno.
\---
Cuando alcanza el 50% de su {%pvmax,plural:other}: {PropertyEffect:45[ENRABIA]} a los {%Family_Bwork_Name,plural:other} de modo permanente.
description.de:
{%FightTurnStarted} {ATvalue:p,percent,+} je {PropertyEffect:45[WÜTENDEM]} {%Family_Bwork_Name} für die Runde.
\---
Wenn er 50\_% seiner {%pvmax,plural:other} erreicht: Versetzt die {%Family_Bwork_Name,plural:other} dauerhaft in {PropertyEffect:45[RAGE]}.
description.pt:
{%FightTurnStarted} {ATvalue:p,percent,+} por {%Family_Bwork_Name} {PropertyEffect:45[RAIVOSO]} durante o turno.
\---
Quando ele chega a 50% de sua {%pvmax,plural:other}: {PropertyEffect:45[ENRAIVECE]} os {%Family_Bwork_Name,plural:other} permanentemente.
